QuestData.Title: Round 4: The P.U.G.
QuestData.Description: And now the final round. I have selected three challengers for you to face. This may seem unfair... to a weakling. You are not a weakling, correct?$b$bGo to the main temple, stand in the grand arena, and face these three challengers. Prove you are stronger than their combined power!$b$bGood luck, Challenger!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Each has a strength they lend to the fight.
